import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import CountryList from './SideBar/CountryList' export default class EditProfile extends Component { render() { return (

What language/s are you learning? Education or Profession: What skills would you like to share? What are you interested in? Upload Profile Picture:
this.props.handleFileUpload (event)} />

) } }
